name: Dunebug
description:
You and your buddy made a bunch of cars really mad.

Blast across the dunes, scavenge ammo for your buddy, drive to survive. Good luck, Dunebug.

Made for 7DFPS game jam 2021

  • Made by: Brendon Chung
  • Terrain by: Luke Hetherington
  • Libraries used: FNA, BEPU Physics, DPSF Particles
  • Audio: freesound.org
  • Car model: turbosquid.com
